list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a large crowd of people, especially one that is disorderly and intent on causing trouble or violence.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một đám đông người biểu tình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: crowd around (someone) in an unruly and excitable way in order to admire or attack them.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was mobbed by autograph hunters
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta đã bị huy động bởi những người thợ săn chữ ký
